definition: surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

sentences.english: Lorraine Wile, a Geography tutor at St Hilda's College, posed the question.
sentences.chinese: 洛林怀尔，在圣希尔达学院地理导师提出的问题。

sentences.english: The Carolingian empire was considered a rebirth of the culture of the Roman Empire.
sentences.chinese: 他统治下的加洛林王朝被认为是罗马文明的重生。

sentences.english: France ceded Alsace-Lorrance to Germany in 1871.
sentences.chinese: 法国于1871年将阿尔萨斯和洛林割让给德国。

sentences.english: Did he get arrested in South Carolina?
sentences.chinese: 他在南卡洛林娜州被逮捕的吧？

sentences.english: Elfloving creations of stunning elegance and captivating originality.
sentences.chinese: 伊芙洛林的作品兼具极致典雅与迷人创意。

sentences.english: After a fight with Theresa, Lorraine goes to a party on her own.
sentences.chinese: 经过打击特丽萨，洛林都到了她自己的党。

sentences.english: The co-owner is an old friend.
sentences.chinese: 店主之一是洛林的老朋友。

sentences.english: We welcomed Laurel and Lorraine to the team.
sentences.chinese: 我们欢迎劳雷尔和洛林的团队。

sentences.english: Lorraine and Theresa are the only lesbian residents of Brewster Place.
sentences.chinese: 洛林和特丽萨是唯一的女同志居民布鲁斯特广场。

sentences.english: She agrees with Lorin Rees about the limitations of self-publishing.
sentences.chinese: 她同意与洛林里斯自我出版的局限性。

sentences.english: Lorraine gains confidence from her burgeoning relationship with Ben.
sentences.chinese: 洛林收益从她的信任与本蓬勃发展。

sentences.english: The film also stars Shia LaBeouf, Carey Mulligan and Josh Brolin.
sentences.chinese: 电影卡司包括西亚李毕福，凯莉墨理根和乔许布洛林。

sentences.english: Peace was signed at Frankfort surrendering the provinces of Alsace and Lorraine to the Germans.
sentences.chinese: 和平协议在法兰克福签署，阿尔萨斯和洛林。

definition: the Franks (Germanic people who arrived in Europe from 600 AD and took over France)
Sachsen or Saxony, Bundesland in east of Germany, bordering on Poland and Czech republic, capital Dresden 德累斯頓|德累斯顿[De2 lei4 si1 dun4]
